revised_title: Fossil Mammals of Australia: Mandibular Dentition and Skeletal Parts of Palorchestes
tldr: This article discusses the mandibular dentition and skeletal parts of the extinct Australian mammal, Palorchestes. The author examines the dental and osteological characteristics of Palorchestes, comparing them to other macropodids, and provides insights into the anatomy and evolution of these fascinating creatures.
